metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15605 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
HTTP request smuggling in Node.js 10, 12, and 13 causes malicious payloaddelivery when transfer-encoding is malformed

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15605` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnode108 - 10.19.0~dfsg-3ubuntu1
nodejs - 10.19.0~dfsg-3ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nodejs package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '10.19.0~dfsg-3ubuntu1').
